```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

#All Years Check
##Admissions Weekly Check

```{r}
ggplot(data_AY_a,aes(x=WeekDay,y=Admissions,colour=Year,group=Year)) +
   geom_point(size = 2) + geom_path(size=1)+
scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 70), expand = c(0, 0),breaks=seq(0,70,by=10)) + 
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(plot.margin = margin(20, 7, 3, 1.5),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(
      angle = 45,
      hjust = 1,
      vjust = 1,
         size = 8),
    axis.title.x =element_blank(),
    axis.title.y=element_text(margin = margin(t = 0, r = 10, b = 0, l = 0),size=8.5,face="bold"))
ggsave("Admissions_Weekly.png")
```

##Admissions Monthly Check(2005-2014)

